mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cart (uid, pid, price, num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time) VALUES (#{uid}, #{pid}, #{price}, #{num}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_cart WHERE uid=#{uid} AND pid=#{pid}

SELECT cid,uid,t_cart.pid,t_cart.price,t_cart.num,t_product.title,t_product.price AS realPrice,t_product.image FROM t_cart LEFT JOIN t_product ON t_cart.pid=t_product.pid WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY t_cart.created_time DESC
